basics.name: Nick Cawthon
basics.label: User Experience
basics.summary: I am the User Experience Director for Loggly. I work to empower developers to build awesome things for other developers each and every day.

work.summary: Leading all User Experience and Product Design efforts
highlights: First design hire for a company re-inventing its product from a pseudo-CLI to a more full-fledged feature set
Introduced user research to Loggly, conducting over 150 test sessions to inform educated interaction design
Conduct executive workshops to ideate and define new product features and company direction

work.summary: Sole proprietor of a UX / Design consultancy, engaging in client-based product design efforts for the duration of my career
highlights: Designed and built the intranet for the San Francisco Giants
Worked in-house with Pivotal Labs Singapore on a Joey Ito startup
Presented to the CMO of Verizon, who was a narcoleptic and promptly fell asleep

work.summary: Design leadership of a long-established digital shop here in San Francisco
highlights: Managed a small UX team of Content Strategists, Information Architects and Interaction Designers across a number of mobile and browser-based applications for both Consumer and Enterprise-focused clients
Established an internal UX department, growing to service all site work agency-wide
Acted as the public face of Organic's UX practice by authoring articles on their industry sites
Led the strategy and design around the largest intranet in the world, as measured by user base

work.summary: The photo-sharing app that wasn't worth a billion dollars
Founded a design and development agency that collapsed in the (second) dotcom bubble
San Francisco-based digital design agency with a strong sense of swiss aesthetic
Taught courses of 150 students who to code in an open-source framework, following best-practices for web accessibility
First hire of an internal digital group to provide design and development services to agency clients
Lead designer of AltaVista image search (at the time), the largest collection of media on the web

volunteer.summary: Events organizer for the 4,000 member chapter of Interaction Designers here in San Francisco
Design and development efforts for the San Francisco Olympic summer games bid in 2024.

education.area: Human Computer Interaction : Design Computing and Cognition
School of Architecture and Applied Arts
